definition: to investigate (sth) thoroughly/to get to the bottom of
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to get to the heart of the matter
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
erhua variant of 追根究底[zhui1 gen1 jiu1 di3]

sentences.english: There is no end to what the children want to know; they always like to demand the how and why.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們的求知慾是無止境的，他們凡事總要尋根究底。

sentences.english: The reason behind this is that it makes the products seem to have higher protein levels.
sentences.chinese: 歸根究底是因爲它能使產品看上去蘊含豐富的蛋白質。

sentences.english: Girls check you for not calling them.
sentences.chinese: 女孩總會根究你爲什麼不打電話給她。

sentences.english: But sincere or insincere, the intentions of persons are not here under question.
sentences.chinese: 但不管是真誠還是虛僞，有心人不必在兒這盤根究底。

sentences.english: He was the most inquisitive Chinese of a high rank ?I have met.
sentences.chinese: 他是我見過的中國高級官員中最愛尋根究底的人。

sentences.english: If they try to know more, it's a notice to quit.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們再想根究別的什麼，那就等於通知我搬家。

sentences.english: The search for power begins when we quiet young.
sentences.chinese: 當我們還很小的時候，尋根究底的力量就開始顯現了。

sentences.english: After all, he’d looked at my core and seen it for what it was.
sentences.chinese: 歸根究底，他曾見過我的內核，並且看見了它的本相。

sentences.english: One must be thorough in acquiring knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 求學問一定要有追根究底的精神。

sentences.english: Argumentative , that is, right now the end of a bar.
sentences.chinese: 追根究底，就是對現在的一種終結吧。

sentences.english: The mayor intended to get to the bottom of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 市長打算將此事尋根究底。

sentences.english: Is the reason our lack of prayer?
sentences.chinese: 歸根究底，是否正因爲我們缺少禱告？

sentences.english: In the end, it boils down to a question of complexity.
sentences.chinese: 到最後，歸根究底複雜的問題。

sentences.english: When science cannot explain these mysteries, how can WESLEY?
sentences.chinese: 科學也無法解釋的迷，衛斯理又如何尋根究底？

sentences.english: Nowadays, the competition in this world is the competition for talents.
sentences.chinese: 當今世界的競爭，歸根究底是人才的競爭。

definition: to know all about/to be informed of all the details
lit. to dig up the root/to get to the heart of (the matter)
root/foundation
foundation/root
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
variant of 核[he2]/to investigate
genealogical record/record of ancestors/family tree
fault/mistake/shortcoming/error/misconduct
worrying
old grudge/long-standing resentment
unknown/unclear
to make sth difficult/to create obstacles
to collapse/to topple/to capsize
to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)
variant of 要麼|要么[yao4 me5]
